### AI Researcher | Data Scientist | Freelancer
---

Hi there! I am Akshay Suresh. Professionally, I love developing artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms to tackle challenging real-world problems and generate sustainable benefit for humanity. 

Building on my educational training in physics and data science, I am excited to make impactful contributions in the following domains.

* AI for climate change
* AI for healthcare
* Environment perception algorithms for autonomous vehicles
* Pioneering safe artificial general intelligence

Outside of work, I enjoy following cricket, playing board games, and exploring natural wonders. Visit my [About](about.qmd) and [Projects](projects.qmd) pages to hear of my experiences in and beyond the workplace.
